description: The response for the `get` command of Credential Helpers.

headers.description: The headers containing credentials which tools should add to all requests to the URI.

expires.description:
The time the credentials expire and stop being valid for new requests, formatted following [RFC 3339](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339.html).

If set, tools **SHOULD** cache the credentials and **SHOULD NOT** invoke the `get` command of the Credential Helper for the URI specified in the request unless either this time has passed or the remote service indicated the credentials are expired, revoked, or invalid for any other reason, or the tool expects the server to indicate such an error (for example, because the credentials are known to expire before the tool expects an operation is complete). Otherwise, tools **MAY** assume that the credentials are valid indefinitely or for a tool-specified duration before re-validating them.
